required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Real World Study of Four PD-1 Agents in China
clinical_study.official_title: Real World Study of Immunotherapy-Comparison of Four PD-1 Agents in China

lead_sponsor.agency: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

clinical_study.source: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

brief_summary.textblock: Consecutive patients treated with PD-1 therapy in Qingdao City were included in our study. The effecy and safety of the four PD-1 agents according to clinical outcomes in real world will be studied.

detailed_description.textblock: Consecutive patients treated with PD-1 therapy in Qingdao City were included in our study. The effecy and safety of the four PD-1 agents according to clinical outcomes in real world will be studied. ORR will be studied of the four PD-1 agents（nivolumab, pembrolizumab, toripalimab, sintilimab）

primary_outcome.description: ORR was defined as the percentage of participants in the analysis population who had a Complete Response (CR; disappearance of all target lesions) or Partial Response (PR; at least a 30% decrease in the sum of diameters of target lesions, taking as reference the baseline sum diameters). The percentage of strongly PD-L1 positive participants who experienced a CR or PR is presented.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Experiencing Adverse Events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse events are defined as any adverse medical events that occur in the participants taking the drugs and do not necessarily have a causal relationship with the treatment.

other_outcome.description: PFS was defined as the time from the first day of study treatment to the first documented disease progression per irRC or death due to any cause, whichever occurred first.

arm_group.description: Consecutive patients treated with nivolumab single or combined chemotherapy/targeting therapy.
Consecutive patients treated with pembrolizumab single or combined chemotherapy/targeting therapy.
Consecutive patients treated with toripalimab single or combined chemotherapy/targeting therapy.
Consecutive patients treated with sintilimab single or combined chemotherapy/targeting therapy.

intervention.description: compare the effecy and safety of 4 PD-1 agents single and combined with chemotherapy in chinese people.

study_pop.textblock: Consecutive patients treated with PD-1 agents (nivolumab, pebrolizumab, toripalimab, sintilimab)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with lung cancer, liver cancer and other solid cancers
- Histologically or cytologically confirmed diagnosis cancer treated with PD-1 agents
- At least one measurable lesion
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Scale 0 or 1 Adequate organ function
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients treated with PD-1 agents less than 2 terms

overall_official.affiliation: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

facility.name: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University
responsible_party.investigator_title: Director of Cancer Precision Medical Center

patient_data.ipd_description: IPD only shared in the study group
